name: BOXGAME (MariusBLGQ)
description:
BOXGAME is a simple game in which you have to throw balls at block structures to make them fall off the platform they stand on.

The challenge is to win each level with the limited amount of balls given at the beginning. If you do so, you will get an icon in the menu that indicates your victory.

If you run out of balls and don't want to restart the level, you can click on the button that appears in the bottom-left corner of the screen to get an unlimited amount of balls. However, if you do this, your victory won't be registered.

Controls :

  • arrow keys : aim
  • space bar : shoot
  • the mouse is used in menus

Warning about levels 7 and 8 : these two levels contain hundreds of boxes, which is why they are likely to slow down the game. If your computer is too old or not powerful enough, you might have trouble playing these levels.

BOXGAME is meant to played directly in your web browser. However, you can also download a version of the game that you can install on your computer and run offline. The download links are below.
